column1: Aulë governs the substances of the [[Ambar]] and he delights in all works and crafts all of which he is master, from small works of skin to the forging of all lands and mountains and basins of the sea. He made the rocks, the gems and all minerals.<ref name=vala>{{S

He enjoyed his skill of devising and making new things, and being praised. In these thoughts and powers he was like [[Melkor]], as [[Ilúvatar]] gave him scarce less skill and knowledge. Aule was always faithful to Eru and submitted all his creations to His will. He was never jealous of others' creations, but sought and gave counsel. He enjoyed in the things he made and in the making itself and passed ever to some new work, without hoarding or possessing. For this, there was much strife between him and Melkor who envied him; Melkor always marred his work and Aule always sought to repair them.<ref name=vala/><ref name=ai>{{S
He was the third most powerful of the [[Aratar]]. He was husband to [[Yavanna]], with whom he [[Mansions of Aulë
